meanings.sent1: She upped her game by practicing every day.
meanings.sent2: He upped the ante in the negotiation.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel upped its nut collection to impress its squirrel friends.
meanings.sent4: The student upped her knowledge by reading extra books.
meanings.sent5: The chef upped the spice level in the dish to make it more flavorful.

meanings.definition: To move to a higher position or level
meanings.sent1: The elevator upped to the top floor smoothly.
meanings.sent2: He upped his seat to get a better view of the stage.
meanings.sent3: The balloon upped slowly, carrying the little girl with it.
meanings.sent4: The rocket upped into the sky, leaving a trail of smoke behind.
meanings.sent5: The hot air balloon upped gently, offering a breathtaking view of the landscape.
